body.name: BONTEC Low Profile Tilt TV Wall Mount for 23-60 inch LCD LED OLED TVs, Ultra Slim Bracket Loading Capacity 99LBS, Max.VESA 400x400mm
body.merchantInfo: Sold by The BONTEC and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest Same-Day delivery Today 5 PM - 10 PM. Order within 3 hrs 53 mins
FREE delivery February 23 - 25 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: VESA MOUNT COMPATIBILITY: Fits most 23'' - 60'' flat & curved TVs weighing up to 99LBS; compatible VESA holes: 400x400/400x300/400x200/300x300/200x200/200x100/100x100/75x75/50x50mm. Please confirm the VESA, weight and size specification of your TV before purchasing.
FLAT TO WALL: Engineered with a low profile design, this TV mount measures only 1.2INCH from the wall to ensure that it is almost invisible after installation, space-saving with neat appearance.
IMPROVE YOUR VIEWING EXPERIENCE: Comes with a tilt feature that allows you to tilt down 0-15° so you can choose the most comfortable position while reducing glare and neck/eye strain.
ULTRA STRONG & DURABLE: Constructed from reinforced cold-rolled steel finished with black powder coat, this wall mount is extremely sturdy and durable.

EASY INSTALLATION: TV wall mount is suitable for both wood studs and concrete walls (Wall Anchors included). The integrated spring locking system makes it easy locking and quick release of your TV. The wall mount comes: 5 x cable ties, spirit level, easy-to-understand instructions and all the necessary product fixtures.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Low-Profile Design This TV wall mount is compatible with VESA size from 50x50mm to 400x400mm. Constructed of heavy-duty powder-coated steel, the TV mount is very sturdy and durable. Capacity Size This tilted TV wall mount enhances maximum stability for lifetime use, great for fitting most LED/OLED/LCD Flat TVs from 23”-60”, weighing up to 99 lbs.

Easy Installation Easily attach your TV to solid concrete or wood studs with this tilting wall mount bracket. 15° Tilting This TV wall mount features a tilt adjustment to improve your viewing experience. Low-Profile Design The wall mount measures only 1.1inch from the wall to ensure that it is almost invisible after installation, space-saving with neat appearance. Fits Installation Methods DO NOT install this tilted TV wall mount into drywall alone.
Safety Locks Thanks to the integrated spring locking system, you can pull cords for easy lock or removal of your TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to install with the level included. It's holding my 55 inch tv pretty stable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good economical mount
reviews.reviewText: Used to mount our older 55" Samsung LED television. The bracket includes quite a bit mounting hardware to make sure the 400mm brackets fit on the back of the TV, with various length screws and spacers included. The mount that goes on the wall is nicely slotted so you can screw it into the wall studs 16" (or thereabouts) on center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good but not for my Visio
reviews.reviewText: It is a good mount, however, the description says for 23-60 in tv. I have a 46-inch Visio tv and the mount holes in the back of the tv did not line up. I am returning since it doesn't fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Span two 16 inch studs
reviews.reviewText: The wall plate is designed to span two studs. Unless you have 8 inch or lower stud spacing it can't be centered on a stud. For standard 16 in stud spacing, it must be centered between two studs (for wider stud spacing it doesn't work). If you are picky about the wall position of the TV and wanted it centered near a stud, buy a different wall mount. With 400mm wide VESA the TV must be centered within 0.75 in of the center of the wall plate. Narrower VESA gives you more range to mount the TV off center on the wall plate, up to 4.7 inches to either side for 200mm and 6.6 in for 100mm. But you might want up to 8 inches off center before a different pair of studs would work better and you can't get that much with this wall mount.The L and R marked on the vertical pieces are from your viewpoint as you attach them to the back of the monitor (not from the completed orientation looking at the front of the monitor). A pair of pictures in the instructions makes that clear. If you have 400mm wide VESA, you must get L vs. R correct or it won't work at all. Several of the bad reviews say it doesn't work with 400mm VESA, one of which (saying it was done by a professional installer) shows it not working and clearly shows the L vs R pieces are reversed. My photo of this product attached to the back of my 50 inch TV with 400mm wide VESA shows it working well with L, R pieces correct. It also works for 400mm high VESA, but I don't have a photo of that. For narrower VESA, I don't think it is important to get L vs. R correct (unless you need the full flexibility for off center positioning). My photo (top down view) of the verticals attached to my 32 inch monitor shows L vs. R intentionally backward, because I think that works a little better for this monitor's recessed 75mm VESA mount.If you have power or display cord sticking straight back (as you see in my photo of my 32 inch monitor) that may be a problem. The cords as shown do not work. The monitor mounts slightly too close to the wall. I had a spare right angle power cord and I bought a right angle DPMI adapter, that would fix this problem. But for other reasons, I wanted this monitor an inch further from the wall and kludged standoffs between the monitor and the vertical pieces. For most monitors, the provided standoffs (much less than an inch) might add just enough for rear facing cords to work. But for most monitors you would need to buy longer screws for the standoffs to work. (Of course most TVs don't have this issue at all because the plugs are built sideways and only need standoffs if the back is curved). The provided standoffs don't work at all with the strange recessed 75mm VESA of my monitor.If you have a monitor smaller than 32 in, or you have 75mm high VESA mount, the vertical pieces will protrude as seen in the photo of the top of my 32 in monitor (75mm VESA). I wouldn't mind that because it is part of a bank of monitors that hide each other's mounting. But for a normal TV, this is likely a bad choice of wall mount for under 32 in and/or 75mm VESA. For 100mm to 300mm VESA on a 32 in or bigger TV there is enough flexibility in how you attach the verticals to the TV to hide them. For 400mm VESA, the verticals couldn't protrude even if you wanted them to.The wall mount screws look like you could use either philips or 10mm hex drive to tighten them. But, as mentioned in a few of the bad reviews, the screws are not high enough quality for the philips to work. The head will strip. The screws are plenty for holding a 50Lb TV on the wall (I'm not sure about the 99Lbs advertised). But you should use a 10mm hex drive, not a philips screw driver. Having put up a large number of similar devices, I would always use hex drive anyway (buying different screws if the ones provided were not hex drive). If you don't have a good stud finder and a ratchet set including 10mm, maybe this is not a product for you. (You still use a philips screw driver to attach the vertical pieces to the TV).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super flat against wall
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put up and adjust to have the tilt. I didn’t want anything too far off the wall. The only downside is that it is so close to the wall that you have to have a recessed outlet to plug it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does the job, but not as well as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Like the simplicity.Disliked the quality and length of the pull cord. This caused an issue when I was unable to reach it easily... And when I finally did, it snapped. Replaced both with parachute cord (yes, you really can fix the world with 550 cord, 100mph tape and bailing wire)Minor point. It is a static angle as it is caused by using washers, basically. Neither good nor bad, just a fact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to mount.
reviews.reviewText: Liked sturdiness and how easy is to hook the tv in place.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bon support conforme à la description
reviews.reviewText: Support métallique en 3 parties, facile à installer.2 barres avec les crochets et les vis + épaisseur fournies à fixer sur la TV et 1 plaque à fixer au mur avec aussi les fixations fournies.Après avoir fixé les barres sur la TV il est possible de régler l'inclinaison ensuite c'est conseillé de le faire à 2 personnes mais si votre TV n'est pas trop lourde ou trop grande il suffit de placer les crochets sur la plaque murale et ensuite tirer sur les ficelles pour clipser les sécurités sur le dessous de plaque mais ceci reste facultatif car pas vraiment nécessaire.Bref bon support pour TV écran plat pour ma part de 55"

reviews.reviewTitle: Robust, einfach zu montieren und Preislich Unschlagbar!
reviews.reviewText: Ich habe 2 dieser Halterungen für die 2 Fernseher gebraucht, die an der Wand hängen sollten.Beide haben in verschiedenen Positionen perfekt funktioniert!Die Montage der 1. war am Anfang etwas knifflig, aber bei der 2. war es nach 20 Minuten erledigt.Das Material ist sehr hochwertig.Da kann man fast nichts bemängeln. Auch im Lieferumfang war so viel drin, dass man wirklich merkt, dass der Hersteller Erfahrung hat.Schrauben in allen Größen & Abstandshalter waren dabei. Sogar eine kleine Miniwasserwaage :DVon meiner Seite gibt es nur positives zu berichten. Jetzt kommt es nur noch auf die Haltbarkeit an, aber ich denke da sehe ich für die nächsten Jahre keine Probleme.Tolles Produkt!

Questa staffa tv è un accessorio eccezionale! La sua versatilità, combinata con la robustezza e la facilità di installazione, la rende una scelta fantastica per una vasta gamma di televisori da 23-60 pollici. La solidità della struttura offre una sensazione di sicurezza mentre la TV è montata, garantendo una visione ottimale da ogni angolazione. La compatibilità con diversi modelli di TV e la praticità nell'installazione la rendono un acquisto impeccabile per chiunque cerchi una staffa di alta qualità.

Le kit est très complet et la notice explique très bien le montage. Petit bémol mon écran a le câble d'alimentation qui est en angle droit derrière l'écran et pas en parallèle donc ça coince un peu et ça m'empêche de pouvoir incliner l'écran à ma guise. Fallait vraiment y penser, tant pis, ça me va ainsi.Vis, cheville, cerflex scratch, tout est fournis pour le montage il ne vous faut qu'une perceuse et une mèche de 4 ou 6mm (je ne me souviens plus exactement)
